subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Tajh Boyd passed for 340 yards and 4 touchdowns to break Philip Rivers’s Atlantic Coast Conference career record in No. 8 Clemson’s 55-31 victory over visiting Georgia Tech.
snippet: Tajh Boyd passed for 340 yards and 4 touchdowns to break Philip Rivers’s Atlantic Coast Conference career record in No. 8 Clemson’s 55-31 victory over visiting Georgia Tech.
